name: Ring King 51
description:
The future of televised wrestling is in PERIL!  

Ring King Entertainment network is perilously close to BANKRUPCY! In a last-ditch effort to attract the viewership necessary to continue, their 4 best wrestlers are fighting in an all-new challenge where the rules change EVERY 10 SECONDS. Some of which are certainly OSHA violations.

You and up to 3 other local players face off in the ring to see who comes out on top. Either play against the AI or grab some friends and controllers and duke it out!

Can you put on a show packed with enough mayhem to save the network? See you in the ring!

This was an entry to Ludum Dare 51 with the theme Every 10 seconds. It was made in 72 hours by a team of 4.

The updated files contain quality of life improvements over the jam entry including reduced file size, a streamlined main menu, and the ability to skip the intro cutscenehttps://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/king-ring-ld51
